DESCRIPTION: When this card is #yDevoured, add it to your hand up to #bX times.
#yPurge the oldest card in your #yExhaust pile.
The limit to the number of cards you can draw each turn.
Deal damage equal to your #yRavenous, and heal half that damage.
Increase the #yDevoured card cap for #bX-Cost cards.
At the start of your turn, lose #bX HP then #yDevour up to #bX cards to reduce this.
#yRavenous also deals its damage to a random enemy. NL NL If you already have the effect, trigger your #yRavenous but take no damage.
Halve the next source of Non-Attack damage you take.
